featured.text: It won’t magically transport a student to school on time every day, but it just might make __25__ a little easier.
not only good service but also convenient public transport.
According to Japan’s transport ministry, there were 613 cases of train services suspended or delayed for at least 30 minutes resulting from collisions with deer and other wild animals in 2016-17.

definition.en_def: The act of moving goods or people from one place to another.
definition.example: The company specializes in the transport of heavy machinery.
